column9: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column19: Expenses for staff missions and duty travel between the three places of work
column21: This appropriation is intended to cover expenditure on duty travel by staff of the institution
column22: seconded national experts and trainees between place of employment and any of the European Parliament’s three places of work (Brussels
column23: Luxembourg and Strasbourg) and on missions to any location other than the three places of work. Expenditure is made up of transport costs
column25: accommodation costs and compensatory allowances for unsocial hours. Ancillary costs (including cancellation of tickets and hotel reservations
column26: electronic invoicing costs and mission insurance costs) are also covered.

column9: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column19: Expenses for staff missions and duty travel between the three places of work

column21: Relations with parliaments of third countries and support for parliamentary democracy and human rights
column23: Geographical area covered: countries outside the European Union with the exception of European Union candidate and potential candidate countries.

column9: EXPENDITURE RESULTING FROM GENERAL FUNCTIONS CARRIED OUT BY THE INSTITUTION
column21: Relations with parliaments of third countries and support for parliamentary democracy and human rights
column23: This appropriation is intended to cover the expenditure committed for promoting relations between the European Parliament and democratically elected national parliaments from third countries as well as with corresponding regional parliamentary organisations. It relates notably to activities aimed at strengthening the parliamentary capacity in new and emerging democracies
column24: promoting human rights and encouraging the use of new information and communication technologies by parliaments.
